body:
I have just installed a ASP.Net Mvc application on a windows server 2008.

When I try to use the application I see that IIS 7 tries to use the static file handler, I therefore get a 403 or 404 error.

How do I get it to use the MVC handler?

**EDIT**

Have also tried asking this question on serverfault. It has a bounty [here](http://serverfault.com/questions/103103/running-a-asp-net-mvc-application-on-windows-server-2008)
title: ASP.Net MVC Application on Windows Server 2008 uses static file handler
